class.name: PoolStringArray
class.description: An [Array] specifically designed to hold [String]s. Optimized for memory usage, does not fragment the memory. [b]Note:[/b] This type is passed by value and not by reference.

method.name: PoolStringArray
method.description: Constructs a new [PoolStringArray]. Optionally, you can pass in a generic [Array] that will be converted.

method.name: append
method.description: Appends an element at the end of the array (alias of [method push_back]).

method.name: append_array
method.description: Appends a [PoolStringArray] at the end of this array.

method.name: insert
method.description: Inserts a new element at a given position in the array. The position must be valid, or at the end of the array ([code]idx == size()[/code]).

method.name: invert
method.description: Reverses the order of the elements in the array.

method.name: join
method.description: Returns a [String] with each element of the array joined with the given [code]delimiter[/code].

method.name: push_back
method.description: Appends a string element at end of the array.

method.name: remove
method.description: Removes an element from the array by index.

method.name: resize
method.description: Sets the size of the array. If the array is grown, reserves elements at the end of the array. If the array is shrunk, truncates the array to the new size.

method.name: set
method.description: Changes the [String] at the given index.

method.name: size
method.description: Returns the size of the array.
